name: Car Tuning Simulator
description:
Car Tuning Simulator is designed so that you can create, modify and paint your own, luxury car, and then go to the track to test it in action! Choose one of the suggested cars, replace the hood, headlights, wheels, and other components. This game offers you a flexible car customization editor, a wide selection of spare parts, as well as a realistic city track on which you can quickly accelerate!

Features


  • Flexible car improvement system
  • A racing track and a picturesque suburb
  • Realistic controls
  • Cheerful background music
  • Unreal graphics
